This is a Mobile Apps Development final project. 

 Movie Ticket Booking Application 

Tutor: 
 - Mr. Nguyễn Thanh Phước 
 - Mr. Mai Văn Mạnh 

Developers: 
 - Nguyễn Quốc Cường - 518H0003 
 - Trần Thị Mỹ Nhi - 518H0543 

This app is used for online booking movie ticket from cinema. It allows to access a list of currently playing movies, reading cinema's news, book multiple tickets at once in a showtime. We can also view movie feedback and check booking history. 
We hope you enjoy this application. Thank you! 

Thank you Mr. Nguyễn Thanh Phước and Mr.Mai Văn Mạnh for helping us to completing this project!!
